de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater

Class IdInflater

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater.IdInflater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inflater

    public class IdInflater
extends java.lang.Object
implements Inflater
    An inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a resource id.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IdInflater(int viewId)
      Creates a new inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a resource id.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      View inflate(Context context, ViewGroup parent, boolean attachToRoot)
      Inflates and returns the view.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • IdInflater

        public IdInflater(int viewId)
        Creates a new inflater, which allows to inflate views, which may be referenced by a resource id.
        Parameters:
        viewId - The resource id of the view, which should be inflated, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource

    • Method Detail

      • inflate

        public final View inflate(Context context,
           ViewGroup parent,
           boolean attachToRoot)
        Description copied from interface: Inflater
        Inflates and returns the view.
        Specified by:
        inflate in interface Inflater
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        parent - The parent, that this view will eventually be attached to, as an instance of the class ViewGroup. The parent may not be null
        attachToRoot - True, if the inflated view should also be attached to the parent, false otherwise
        Returns:
        The view, which has been inflated, as an instance of the class View The view may not be null
